dublin_core.dcvalue: Mike Bailey, Systems Development Manager, Johns Hopkins Center for Communication Programs, Email: mike.bailey@jhu.edu

The Interactive Distance Education Application (iDEA) system is designed for midwives and provides a platform from which providers can access relevant educational content and resources from Android-based smartphones or tablets.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:15Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 idea-interactive_distance_education_application.pdf: 207427 bytes, checksum: 7384ee15d338c7f0fa50a5b92b4ce92f (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Provider training and education, Family planning, Maternal health, Sexual and reproductive health
